title: The Cod Codex
author: Fin Katherine
pages: Aye, the humble cod. Found in oceans far and wide, and a staple to any seasoned fisherfolk.
Cod are abundant, making 'em a reliable choice for both greenhorns and salty sea dogs alike.
They're a schooling fish, so once you've caught one, there's a good chance more are nearby.
Roast 'em over a campfire or in a furnace for a feast that's hard to beat.
Ye best be swift, for they nip the bait with a quickness that'll catch an unwary fisher off guard.
